subject: ANN: "Unit Testing in Java" available
msgSnippet: My book Unit Testing in Java - How Tests Drive the Code is now available, although Amazon still says it is not:
messageBody:
My book "Unit Testing in Java - How Tests Drive the Code" is now
available, although Amazon still says it is not:
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1558608680

The book teaches how to use JUnit to develop applications in a test-
first style and covers advanced topics, eg. web applications, GUIs,
databases and threaded apps.

Search within http://www.mkp.com to download forewords, table of
contents and sample chapter.

Johannes
